summary: I RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION FOR THE PASSENGER AIRBAG ABOUT SPRING OR SUMMER 2016.  MY LOCAL. CHRYSLER DEALERSHIP DID NOT HAVE THE PARTS TO DO THE RECALL.  I RECEIVED SECOND RECALL NOTICE IN THE WINTER.  THEY SAID THEY STILL DON'T HAVE THE PARTS TO DO THE RECALL.  I'M STILL WAITING FOR THEM TO CONTACT ME.
